medium: Pen and black ink over graphite on beige wove paper, with perforations of sketchbook page at left edge
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed:
Signed recto, lower right, in graphite: Modigliani; inscribed
verso, lower right corner, in graphite: 43, and numbers or
letters (crossed out); inscribed on former modern laid paper
backing, lower right corner, in graphite: from Zromowski
[sic] / 1934
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right,: Modigliani
